casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Miller, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Miller v. Indus. Comm. (2001), 93 Ohio St.3d 415.]

(No. 01-251 Submitted July 17, 2001 Decided October 10, 2001.) Koltak & Gibson, L.L.P., Ronald J. Koltak and Peter J. Gibson, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. *416Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Kimberly M. Connett, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.
